# ADR Template

**.GitHub:** ADR Proposal issue template â†’ [./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/adr.md](/mnt/data/template-adr.md)

## Title

Short, descriptive title of the decision.

## Status

Proposed | Accepted | Deprecated | Superseded

## Context

Describe the relevant context, constraints, and background leading to this decision.

## Decision

Clearly state the decision that has been made.

## Consequences

Detail the expected outcomes, tradeoffs, and impacts of this decision.

## Alternatives Considered

List other options that were evaluated and why they were not selected.

## Review and Approval

Document owner, reviewers, and approval date.

## Example

```text
### Title
Sample ADR Example Title

### Status
Proposed

### Context
Provide a brief description of the situation prompting the architectural decision.

### Decision
State the architectural choice clearly.

### Consequences
- Summarize the expected outcomes.
- Note any potential tradeoffs or risk factors.

### Alternatives Considered
- **Option A**: Brief explanation.
- **Option B**: Brief explanation.
- **Option C**: Brief explanation.

### Review and Approval
Reviewer Name(s), Roles
```

## Metadata

```
Owner: Documentation Lead
Reviewers: Governance, Architecture, Operations
Status: Active
Last Updated: <YYYY-MM-DD>
```
